title: Manes presbyteriani, or, The monuments of the Kirk the covenants confession : Argyle's reliques : Guthrey and Giffan's passions : and Gillespy's recantation : all compiled and laid together.
author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.
publisher: Printed for the Reverend C Lasses ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
